MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 06-DEC-2020 03:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of Sutton Manor, affecting properties in Tennyson Street and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault with the underground network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:26pm on 5th December 2020.
